00057 GrSubsys::GrSubsys( unsigned int screenWidth, unsigned int screenHeight, bool uberDXTCompress, bool uberOverlaySupport )
00058 : _screenWidth( screenWidth )
00059 , _screenHeight( screenHeight )
00060 , _gamma( 1.0f )
00061 , _brightness( 1.0f )
00062 , _textureQuality( EGQ_HIGH /*EGQ_ULTRA*/ )
00063 , _shadingQuality( EGQ_HIGH /*EGQ_ULTRA*/ )
00064 , _hdrQuality( EGQ_ULTRA )
00065 , _parallaxEnable( true )
00066 , _hdrEnable( true )
00067 , _colorTableDirty( false )
00068 , _uberDXTCompression( uberDXTCompress )
00069 , _uberOverlaySupport( uberOverlaySupport )
00070 {
00073         B_ASSERT( gRFileMgr != 0 );
00074         B_ASSERT( gRRsrcMgr != 0 );
00075         B_ASSERT( uberDXTCompress != uberOverlaySupport );
00076 
00078         B_ASSERT( gGrSubsys == 0 );
00079         gGrSubsys = this;
00080 
00082         GrStateStart( screenWidth, screenHeight );
00083 
00085         new GrRenderTargetMgr( screenWidth, screenHeight );
00086         new GrShaderMgr;
00087         new GrFramebuffer( screenWidth, screenHeight, _hdrQuality, _hdrEnable );
00088         new GrPixelBufferMgr;
00089         new GrMeshBufferMgr;
00090     new GrSoftwareTextureMgr;
00091         new GrTextureMgr( _textureQuality );
00092         new GrMaterialMgr;
00093         new GrUTLoader();
00094         new GrUberDetailCache();
00095         new GrUberTextureMgr();
00096         new GrRenderer( screenWidth, screenHeight, _shadingQuality );
00097         new GrRenderUtil;
00098         new GrTexGen( 0 );
00099         new GrModelMgr;
00100         new GrScene;
00101     new GrSceneRender;
00102 //      new UIFontMgr;
00103         new GrLightMgr;
00104         new GrKFAnimMgr;
00105 
00106         CreateFrameBuffer();
00107 
00108         UpdateColorTable();
00109 
00111         GrRegisterDebugSwitches();
00112 }

00189 //----------------------------------------------------------
00190 void
00191 GrSubsys::SetGamma( float gamma )
00192 {
00193         gamma = Clamp( gamma, 0.5f, 3.0f );
00194         if ( _gamma != gamma )
00195         {
00196                 _gamma = gamma;
00197                 _colorTableDirty = true;
00198         }
00199 }
00200 
00201 //----------------------------------------------------------
00202 void
00203 GrSubsys::SetBrightness( float brightness )
00204 {
00205         brightness = Clamp( brightness, 0.75f, 1.5f );
00206         if ( _brightness != brightness )
00207         {
00208                 _brightness = brightness;
00209                 _colorTableDirty = true;
00210         }
00211 }

00213 //----------------------------------------------------------
00214 void
00215 GrSubsys::TakeScreenshot( const char* fileName )
00216 {
00218         int x = 0;
00219         int y = 0;
00220         int width = 0;
00221         int height = 0;
00222         GrGetViewport( x, y, width, height );
00223         GrReadBuffer( GR_BACK );
00224 
00226         char* pixels = new char[ width * height * 4 ];
00227         bglFinish();
00228         bglReadPixels( x, y, width, height, GL_BGRA, GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE, pixels );
00229 
00231         char* cur = pixels;
00232         for ( int y = 0; y < height; ++y )
00233                 for ( int x = 0; x < width; ++x )
00234                         for ( int c = 0; c < 4; ++c, ++cur )
00235                                 *cur = _colorTable[ *cur & 0xFF ] & 0xFF;
00236 
00238         GrSaveTGA( fileName, pixels, width, height, 4 );
00239 
00241         delete[] pixels;
00242 }

00244 //----------------------------------------------------------
00245 void
00246 GrSubsys::Update( unsigned int timeDelta, unsigned int sysTimeDelta )
00247 {
00248         if ( _colorTableDirty )
00249                 UpdateColorTable();
00250 
00252         if ( timeDelta > 0 )
00253         {
00254                 gGrModelMgr->Update( timeDelta );
00255                 gGrMaterialMgr->Update();
00256         }
00257         gGrScene->Update( timeDelta, sysTimeDelta );
00258 }

00267 //----------------------------------------------------------
00268 void
00269 GrSubsys::Resize( unsigned int width, unsigned int height )
00270 {
00272         gGrRenderer->PreContextReset();
00273         gGrMeshBufferMgr->PreContextReset();
00274         gGrMaterialMgr->PreContextReset();
00275         gGrFramebuffer->PreContextReset();              
00276         gGrRenderTargetMgr->PreContextReset();
00277         gGrPixelBufferMgr->PreContextReset();
00278 
00280         GrStateStop();
00281 
00283         GrStateStart( _screenWidth, _screenHeight );
00284 
00286         gGrTextureMgr->SetTexturingQuality( _textureQuality );
00287         gGrMaterialMgr->SetShadingQuality( _shadingQuality );
00288         gGrFramebuffer->SetHDRQuality( _hdrQuality );
00289         gGrFramebuffer->SetHDREnable( _hdrEnable );
00290         gGrRenderer->SetQuality( _shadingQuality );
00291 
00292         _screenWidth = width;
00293         _screenHeight = height;
00294         GrRenderTarget::ResizePrimaryRT( width, height );
00295 
00297         gGrPixelBufferMgr->PostContextReset();
00298         gGrRenderTargetMgr->PostContextReset();
00299         gGrFramebuffer->PostContextReset( width, height );
00300         gGrMaterialMgr->PostContextReset();
00301         gGrMeshBufferMgr->PostContextReset();
00302         gGrRenderer->PostContextReset( width, height );
00303 
00305         CreateFrameBuffer();
00306 }

00308 //----------------------------------------------------------
00309 void
00310 GrSubsys::Reset( unsigned int width, unsigned int height )
00311 {
00312         PreContextReset();
00313         PostContextReset( width, height );
00314 }

00316 //----------------------------------------------------------

00319 {
00320         PreContextReset();
00321         PostContextReset( GetScreenWidth(), GetScreenHeight() );
00322 }

00324 //----------------------------------------------------------
00325 void
00326 GrSubsys::PreContextReset()
00327 {
00329         B_ASSERT( GrRenderTarget::GetCurrentRT() == gGrRenderTargetMgr->GetPrimaryRenderTarget() );
00330 
00333         B_ASSERT( _uberDXTCompression != _uberOverlaySupport );
00334 
00336         gGrRenderer->PreContextReset();
00337         gGrMeshBufferMgr->PreContextReset();
00338         gGrMaterialMgr->PreContextReset();
00339         gGrTextureMgr->PreContextReset();
00340         gGrFramebuffer->PreContextReset();              
00341         gGrRenderTargetMgr->PreContextReset();
00342         gGrShaderMgr->PreContextReset();
00343         gGrPixelBufferMgr->PreContextReset();
00344 
00346         GrStateStop();
00347 }
00348 
00349 //----------------------------------------------------------
00350 void
00351 GrSubsys::PostContextReset( unsigned int width, unsigned int height )
00352 {
00354         GrStateStart( _screenWidth, _screenHeight );
00355 
00357         gGrTextureMgr->SetTexturingQuality( _textureQuality );
00358         gGrMaterialMgr->SetShadingQuality( _shadingQuality );
00359         gGrFramebuffer->SetHDRQuality( _hdrQuality );
00360         gGrFramebuffer->SetHDREnable( _hdrEnable );
00361         gGrRenderer->SetQuality( _shadingQuality );
00362 
00363         _screenWidth = width;
00364         _screenHeight = height;
00365         GrRenderTarget::ResizePrimaryRT( width, height );
00366 
00368         gGrPixelBufferMgr->PostContextReset();
00369         gGrRenderTargetMgr->PostContextReset();
00370         gGrFramebuffer->PostContextReset( width, height );
00371         gGrTextureMgr->PostContextReset();
00372         gGrShaderMgr->PostContextReset();
00373         gGrMaterialMgr->PostContextReset();
00374         gGrMeshBufferMgr->PostContextReset();
00375         gGrRenderer->PostContextReset( width, height );
00376 
00378         CreateFrameBuffer();
00379 }

00381 //----------------------------------------------------------
00382 bool
00383 GrSubsys::IssueCommand( const tstring& command )
00384 {
00386         tstring::size_type spacePos = command.find_first_of( ' ' );
00387         tstring::size_type tabPos = command.find_first_of( '\t' );
00388         unsigned int wsPos = Min( ( unsigned int )spacePos, ( unsigned int )tabPos );
00389 
00391         tstring commandName = command.substr( 0, wsPos );
00392 
00394         CommandMap::iterator iter = _commands.find( commandName );
00395         if ( iter == _commands.end() )
00396                 return false;
00397 
00399         if ( !iter->second( command ) )
00400                 PrintF( "Invalid command syntax.\n" );
00401 
00403         return true;
00404 }
00405

00409 {
00411         _commands[ command ] = handler;
00412 }

00419 //----------------------------------------------------------
00420 void
00421 GrSubsys::UpdateColorTable()
00422 {
00424         unsigned short gammaTable[ 256 ];
00425 
00427         int curColor = 0;
00428         float invGamma = 1.0f / _gamma;
00429         for ( unsigned int j = 0; j < 256; ++j )
00430         {
00431                 float color = j / 255.0f;
00432 
00434                 color = color * _brightness;
00435                 color = Pow( color, invGamma );
00436 
00438                 curColor = Clamp( ( int )( 255.0f * color ), 0, 255 );
00439 
00441                 gammaTable[ j ] = ( unsigned short )( curColor << 8 );
00442                 _colorTable[ j ] = curColor & 0xFF;
00443         }
00444 /*
00445         for ( unsigned int i = 1; i < 256; ++i )
00446         {
00447                 B_ASSERT( gammaTable[ i ] >= gammaTable[ i-1 ] );
00448                 if ( gammaTable[ i ] < gammaTable[ i-1 ] )
00449                         gammaTable[ i ] = gammaTable[ i-1 ];
00450         }
00451 */
00453         SetGLGamma( gammaTable, gammaTable, gammaTable );
00454 
00456         _colorTableDirty = false;
00457 }
